name: YahooMail small screens
description: reduce padding, font size on yahoo mail to use on small screens. I will not remove ads because that is what make the service free.
additional_info:
v1.0: smaller font on email list and folder names. small search/menu. small toolbar.
v1.1: deleted email tooltip/undo box moved up to not block email list.
v1.2: thin daily divider on message list.
v1.3: user menu and settings menu.
v1.4: fix firefox support. Make recent message tabs smaller.

disclaimer: I work at yahoo, but they didn't mind that I share this as public domain.
